 def tv_l0_norm(im):
     """Compute the (isotropic) TV norm of an image"""
     grad_x1 = np.diff(im, axis=0)
     grad_x2 = np.diff(im, axis=1)
     return (grad_x1[:, :-1]**2 + grad_x2[:-1, :]**2 > 0).mean()
